alert.note: Alert for Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 10 at 12:00AM AKDT until September 10 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds gusting to 45 mph. * WHERE...Along the Alaska Highway east of Dot Lake. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southwest winds gusting to 40 mph were reported along the Alaska Highway near the Robertson River just before midnight. These winds are expected to reach Tanacross and Tok before 1 am Sat. Winds are expected to continue through 6 AM Sat.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
